snippet: “La Substance, but in English,” a four-and-a-half-hour work by Marten Spangberg performed at MoMA PS1, was part of the American Realness festival.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of Marten Spangberg dance piece La Substance, but in English, performed at MoMA PS1 as part of American Realness festival.
lead_paragraph: “La Substance, but in English,” a four-and-a-half-hour work by Marten Spangberg performed at MoMA PS1, was part of the American Realness festival.

headline.seo: ‘La Substance, but in English’ Tweaks Consumerism
headline.main: Kicking Back: Nature of Choreography Revised, With Beer Cans
headline.print_headline: Kicking Back: Nature of Choreography Revised, With Beer Cans
